title: Islands in the stream
creator_credit: Franklin J. Schaffner, Max Palewsky, Peter Bart and Paramount Communications
brief_description: Abridged version of Hemingway’s novel. An artist living alone on his island retreat is visited by his sons. Over the summer, he discovers their mutual need and respect. (This section, however, is not representative of the theme of the novel as a whole). Suitable for upper secondary level.
